title: DMK FUNCTIONARY INVOLVED IN KILLING A FIVE YEAR OLD GIRL TO TAKE BLOOD AND SPRINKLE AS A VOW
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana New CID investigations revealed that a DMK functionary led gang has killed a five year old girl to take her blood to sprinkle around a large building as a vow of black magic in one of the most barbaric and eerie acts….
